subject: Re: [junit] Junit & Log 4j together
msgSnippet: I think you d have more success posting to the ant-users list, but from memory, the ANT junit task replaces System.out with another object which captures all
messageBody:
I think you'd have more success posting to the ant-users list, but from
memory, the ANT junit task replaces System.out with another object which
captures all of the logging to system out.

James

On 21/02/06, Shobhana Daga <KIRTANE@...> wrote:
>
> Hello,
>
> Has anyone been successful in logging the test results or writting any
> information from tests to log file through log4j ?
> The log statements in my case get printed on to the console and also
> get written into a txt file created by the junitreport tag in the
> build.xml.
>
> The log file does get created but nothing is eventually written into it.
>
> Thanks
> Shobhana
>
>
>
>
>
>
>
>
>
